description: Dashboard for VM metrics in a VMware vSphere environments

targets.query: SELECT count(distinct("cpu")) FROM (SELECT "run_summation", "cpu" FROM  "vsphere_vm_cpu" WHERE $timeFilter AND "vmname" =~ /$vm/ AND "cpu" != 'instance-total')

list.definition: show tag values with key = "clustername" where "vcenter" =~/$vc/
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cluster
list.query: show tag values with key = "clustername" where "vcenter" =~/$vc/

list.definition: show tag values with key = "esxhostname" where "clustername" =~/$cluster/ and "vcenter" =~/$vc/
list.label: ESXi
list.name: host
list.query: show tag values with key = "esxhostname" where "clustername" =~/$cluster/ and "vcenter" =~/$vc/

list.definition: show tag values with key = "vmname" where "esxhostname" =~/$host/ and "vcenter" =~/$vc/
list.label: VM
list.name: vm
list.query: show tag values with key = "vmname" where "esxhostname" =~/$host/ and "vcenter" =~/$vc/

title: vSphere - VM details
